price: 4 Que de cités impies avons-Nous anéanties, surprises par Notre châtiment au milieu de la journée ou en pleine nuit.
arabic: وَكَم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَا فَجَآءَهَا بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتًا أَوۡ هُمۡ قَآئِلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wakam min qaryatin ahlaknāhā fajāahā basunā bayātan aw hum qāilūna
